concept.title: Getting started
concept.shortdesc: Get Couchbase Server up and running quickly by following the instructions in the Getting Started guide.

conbody.p: To get the Couchbase Server 4.0 up and running quickly, follow one of these paths:

ul.li: Install and set up Couchbase Server, and then learn how to run N1QL by using the command-line query tool (cbq).
Build and run the sample travel application.
